validations.stringMin: Password should be at minimum {{min}} characters
validations.stringMax: Password should be at least {{max}} characters

step1.title: Choose Channel
step1.description: Choose the provider you want to integrate with Social Engagement.

step2.title: Create Inbox
step2.description: Authenticate your account and create an inbox.

step3.title: Add Agents
step3.description: Add agents to the created inbox.

step4.title: Voila!
step4.description: You are all set to go!

INBOX.title: Choose a channel
INBOX.description: Social Engagement supports live-chat widget, Facebook page, Twitter profile, WhatsApp, Email etc., as channels. If you want to build a custom channel, you can create it using the API channel. Select one channel from the options below to proceed.

AGENT.title: Agents
AGENT.description: Here you can add agents to manage your newly created inbox. Only these selected agents will have access to your inbox. Agents which are not part of this inbox will not be able to see or respond to messages in this inbox when they login.
AGENT.note: PS: As an administrator, if you need access to all inboxes, you should add yourself as agent to all inboxes that you create.

WEBSITE.title: Website channel
WEBSITE.description: Create a channel for your website and start supporting your customers via our website widget.
WEBSITE.form-name-placeholder: Enter your website name (eg: Acme Inc)
WEBSITE.form-tagline-placeholder: We make it simple to connect with us. Ask us anything, or share your feedback
WEBSITE.form-greeting-text: Send a greeting message to the user when he starts the conversation

WHATSAPP.title: WhatsApp Channel
WHATSAPP.description: Start supporting your customers via WhatsApp
WHATSAPP.form-account-sid-placeholder: Please enter your Twilio Account SID
WHATSAPP.form-account-token-placeholder: Please enter your Twilio Account Token
WHATSAPP.form-account-api-placeholder: Please enter your twilio account token
WHATSAPP.form-account-api-link: (Don't have any API key? Apply for access here)

validations.number-match: Please enter a valid value. Phone number should start with `+` sign.

EMAIL.title: Email Channel
EMAIL.form-helper-text: Email where your customers sends you support tickets

validations.name: Channel Name is a required field

TELEGRAM.title: Telegram Channel
TELEGRAM.description: Integrate with Telegram channel and start supporting your customers.
TELEGRAM.form-helper-text: Configure the bot token you have obtained from Telegram BotFather.

validations.required: Bot Token is a required field

FINISH.title: Your Inbox is ready!
FINISH.web-description: You have successfully finished creating a website channel. Copy the code shown below and paste it on your website. Next time a customer use the live chat, the conversation will automatically appear on your inbox.
FINISH.email-description: Start forwarding your emails to the following email address.
FINISH.whatsapp-message: You can now engage with your customers through your new Channel. Happy supporting . You have to configure the message callback URL in Twilio with the URL mentioned here.

profile.title: Profile
profile.description: Your email address is your identity and is used to log in.

password.title: Password
password.description: Updating your password would reset your logins in multiple devices.

validations.min: Please enter a password of length 6 or more
validations.confirm: Confirm password should match the password

audio.title: Audion Notification
audio.description: Enable audio notifications in dashboard for new messages and conversations.

email.title: Email Notifications
email.description: Update your email notification preferences here
email.created: Send email notifications when a new conversation is created
email.assign: Send email notifications when a conversation is assigned to me
email.mention: Send email notifications when you are mentioned in a conversation
email.message: Send email notifications when a new message is created in an assigned conversation

push.title: Push Notifications
push.description: Update your push notification preferences here
push.helper-text: You have enabled push for this browser.
push.created: Send email notifications when a new conversation is created
push.assign: Send email notifications when a conversation is assigned to me
push.mention: Send email notifications when you are mentioned in a conversation
push.message: Send email notifications when a new message is created in an assigned conversation

access.title: Access Token
access.description: This token can be used if you are building an API based integration

emptyChatMsg: Please Connect inbox first to start connect with your customers.
